projects.name: Smart Reply for Social Comments
projects.problem: Social Media Comment Suggestions is a lightweight assistant that helps people reply faster (and better) in comment threads.
projects.hypothesis: People who actively comment on social media will use and value AI-generated, context-aware comment suggestions because it helps them reply faster while sounding more thoughtful and on-brand.
projects.details:
MVP idea (auto-insert scope): Build a lightweight browser extension that detects when a user focuses a comment field, opens a small popover with a few reply-style options, generates 3–5 context-aware suggestions, and pastes the selected suggestion directly into the active input field.

User flow:
1. User clicks the comment/reply field they want to respond to.
2. A popover appears next to the field with reply-style buttons and suggested replies.
3. The user clicks a suggestion and it’s automatically inserted into the comment field (editable before posting).

The tool removes the friction of figuring out what to say by instantly turning context into ready-to-post replies, saving time, reducing social anxiety, and helping users consistently respond with the right tone—whether they want to be thoughtful, witty, professional, or diplomatic.
